p: The applicant performed a literature search regarding substances of concern and chemical composition of the plant species C. aurantiifolia and its preparations. 64 The occurrence of 5‐geranyloxypsoralen, 5‐geranyloxy‐7‐methoxycoumarin, citropten, 5‐MOP, 5,8‐dimethoxypsoralen and 3‐methyl‐1,2‐cyclopentanedione (maple lactone) has been reported in several publications on preparations obtained from C. aurantiifolia (Dugo et al., 1997; NTP, 2000; Gorgus et al., 2010; Shalaby et al., 2011; Masson et al., 2016; Melough et al., 2017).
